translatedText: Pengenalan berorientasi penemuan pada kode koreksi kesalahan.
input: A discovery-oriented introduction to error correction codes.

translatedText: Membantu mendanai proyek masa depan: https://www.patreon.com/3blue1 brown

input: An equally valuable form of support is to simply share some of the videos.

translatedText: Anda dapat membaca perspektif Hamming sendiri mengenai penemuan kode-kode ini di bab 12 dari "The Art of Doing Science and Engineering".
input: You can read Hamming's own perspective on his discovery of these codes in chapter 12 of "The Art of Doing Science and Engineering".
